Uses of Package
eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.pathfinding

Packages that use eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.pathfinding
Package
Description
eu.iv4xr.framework.environments
 
eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.pathfinding
This package provides classes to do pathfinding over a graph.
eu.iv4xr.framework.mainConcepts
 
nl.uu.cs.aplib.exampleUsages.miniDungeon.testAgent
This package contains the implementation of iv4xr Env, State, TacticLib, GoalLib etc, which are necessary to allow an aplib/iv4xr test agent to control the game in the smart way.

    Class
    Description
    SurfaceNavGraph
    A navigation-graph over a 3D-surface.
  • Classes in eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.pathfinding used by eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.pathfinding
    Class
    Description
    AStar.SearchMode
     
    CanDealWithDynamicObstacle
    A feature of a navigation graph that allows obstacles to be added.
    LayeredAreasNavigation.Portal
    Representing a bi-directional "portal" between areas.
    Navigatable
    Describes a graph-like structure that can be navigated by a pathfinder.
    Pathfinder
    Common interface for pathfinding.
    Pathfinder2
    Just another interface for a graph-based pathfinder as an alternative to Pathfinder.
    Priotisable
    Wraps around a type to add a float value on which can be sorted.
    SimpleNavGraph
    This class is provides an implementation of a navigation graph (an instance of Navigatable) that facilitates pathfinding over a 3D-surface defined by a surface-mesh with obstacles.
    Sparse2DTiledSurface_NavGraph.NonNavigableTile
     
    Sparse2DTiledSurface_NavGraph.Tile
     
    SurfaceNavGraph.VertexType
    A vertex is a BORDER-vertex if it lies in a border-edge.
    XPathfinder
    Extension of a graph-based Pathfinder2 that also provides methods supporting exploration over the represented navigation graph.
